phrases: Sis, please pass the soy sauce.
Stand up, then reach out and get it yourself.
Err... I guess I do not need soy sauce today.
What is with this prickly mood in here?
Kagome, I do not know what happened over there...
but it is been so long since we sat down to breakfast together.
So why do not you cheer up, and smile up, and talk up a storm?
Oh boy, what is the matter with that girl?
It seems so long since I came to school.
How can you be so carefree?
While you were absent from school...
Gramps made up another new illness for me!
She is been following Hojo around lately.
And it does not seem as though Hojo minds the attention.
If you ignore her, she will steal him away!
Hojo is easy prey for someone like her!
But... it is not like I am going steady with Hojo.
That is the only reason you can be so nonchalant!
I do not even want to think about that guy!
just what are you suspecting me of?!
Is that how you have been seeing me?!
W- what are you scolding me for?!
I do not want to see your face anymore!
Hmm... it looks like an ordinary old well.
But this connects to Kagome's world?
But the only ones able to cross through the well...
Inuyasha's the only one who can go get Kagome...
He is holding it all up!
Someone out there is bad-mouthing me!
Inuyasha, of course, people will criticize you.
Since you have done something really stupid.
To find the Sacred Jewel fragments...
Yet you got her upset and sent her running home.
She chose to go home herself!
She said, I am going back home, stupid!
Even your imitation of her is stupid.
Oh... this is a fine palm.
You will live a long life and have many children.
Is that really true, Master Monk?
Will not you have one of my children?
You just asked me the same question earlier!
It is something I ask every beautiful woman once.
However, you seem to be willing.
Now then... can I satisfy both of you at the same time?
I see... but it is no use for us to get too worried.
Until Inuyasha cools down, nothing will be solved.
I have seen how headstrong Inuyasha can be.
Do not go near the well.
he will not go to get Kagome even if he wanted to.
Underneath that exterior is a cute, gentle side of him.
You cannot always tell a person by his looks.
And someone else here is a prime example.
I am going to make her apologize!
Now then, you are not getting away today!
Kagome... what kind of guy are you seeing anyway?
So... it is a stupid creep!
He is rough and moody and selfish!
But getting jealous must mean he cares about you.
Oh, then everything's going well with him.
Geez, I thought it was going to be juicier than this.
He really cares only for you.
I would be happy if that were the case.
But he has not been able to forget the woman he loved long ago.
Now that I think about it...
So why does he always get jealous over me?
So Kagome, you are being chased with wild passion!
He even tried to kill someone who approached me!
Why are you seeing a fellow like that?!
Do not ever see him again!
He can be very gentle... and he is strong and reliable.
You must love this guy, Kagome.
This room... is filled with Kagome's scent.
I am Kagome's kid brother, Sota.
You did not have a fight then?
Sis has been in such a bad mood.
Man, can she hold a grudge!
Do not tell Kagome that I came!
It is a promise, man to man.
What are you doing in my room?!
But now that I think about it...
Inuyasha had come to save me that time.
I guess I am at fault.
Why did he go there anyway?!
You told us not to go near the well!
Oh no... these things can be quite entertaining.
We have not seen each other lately.
I thought I should go over to the other time this weekend.
Is Saturday a bad day for you?
Hey, why did you do that?!
An average guy like Hojo is just right for you!
Someone stubborn and rough is not someone you should be seeing!
Or your future will be ruined!
You are going to the movie!
Inuyasha is probably still mad at me.
He is the type to hold a grudge.
I never want to see you again!
If I go back now, we will only fight.
Sis has been in such a bad mood...
Do not pop out at me like that!
You sound like it is all my fault!
Do not you still suspect Kagome!?
Settle it once and for all?!
This is no time for that!
Kagome did indeed protect Koga and helped him escape.
And she was kidnapped by him and suffered!
That is right, Kagome's the one who suffered most at Koga's hands.
So why did she take his side?
Do you think that maybe Kagome really did fall in love with Koga!
If you are going to try to reason with me get your facts straight first!
Why do not you go someplace far away?!
Hey, Inuyasha, I was wrong earlier.
I will not go after her!
These complicated things should be discussed...
with wise old Kaede who has lots of experience with life.
I will not say your name.
I will pretend it is a friend of mine.
Oh well... if that is how you will do it...
I do not mind coming along.
I want some advice about a dog friend of mine.
What of this dog friend of yours?
And fell in love at first sight with the cat.
Naturally, the dog and wolf fought each time they met.
One day, the wolf stole the cat from under the dog.
demons who hated the wolf appeared.
And the wolf was hurt badly.
The dog who came to rescue the cat...
The dog wanted to punish the injured wolf, too...
but the cat protected the wolf and let it escape!
The cat was only trying to help the injured wolf...
but the dog suspected that the cat had feelings for the wolf!
So the cat got very angry and went back to her homeland.
How can we get the cat and dog to be friends again?
First, the dog must acknowledge his mistake.
Is not this about Shippo's dog friend?
Probably, the cat is longing for the dog to come get her.
The dog and cat have misunderstood each other.
That is why nothing can be resolved.
First, they have to see each other.
Then they must talk it over well.
Sis, how long are you going to stay?
I am busy with my studies!
I cannot always be going to the Feudal Era.
That is because Inuyasha comes to get me.
Maybe he will not come anymore.
You are always so angry, that is why he will not come!
I will just get up early and study.
I cannot sleep like this over there.
I wonder what he is doing now.
She is talking in her sleep.
Err... so I will not be able to go to the movies on Saturday.
But really... do not mind me.
You can take that seventh grader.
Is that what you are worried about?
I do not intend to see anyone else.
I see... but I am kind of happy.
I wish Inuyasha had your confidence.
If I say it first, then everything will be all right.
Why are you looking like that?
I am sorta glad that you apologized so graciously.
You apologized about breaking this clock?
What else is there to apologize for?
He went to get you twice.
And since you left, all he is done is sigh.
How do you know I went over there?!
We were just worried about you!
He is happy that you have returned, Kagome.
The wind suddenly turns into fangs...
At Naraku's castle, we come upon...
a mountain of corpses of Koga's Wolf-Demon Tribe.
The wolf pack rise up and attack Inuyasha!
It was not Inuyasha who killed your friends!
Next on Inuyasha: Trapped In A Duel To The Death!
